alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Luna County through 600 PM MDT... At 523 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Akela. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akela, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 92 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
